summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan by amending Transportation Element Figure 1, amending annexation policies in the Land Use Element and adding Potential Annexation Areas, adding Shorelines Policies to the Land Use Element, amending the Neighborhood Planning and Land Use Element regarding the content of neighborhood plans, making minor technical amendments to the Land Use Element, adding language regarding tree preservation in the Land Use Element, and adding the term technology to telecommunications policies, as part of the City's annual Plan amendment for 1996.
